description:
Working to mop up the survivors of the Mass Driver Foundation, the Baby Magnum limps into battle without the chance to make any repairs, relying somewhat more heavily than usual on boots on the ground.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: En joutes équestres, visez les pieds. Guerre totale à Amazon City, partie 1
In a Cavalry Battle, Knock Down the Foothold: The All-Out War in Amazon City I
Kibasen wa Ashimoto o Kuzusubeshi: Amazon City Souryokusen I
騎馬戦は足元を崩すべし アマゾンシティ総力戦 I
